text: kma 'aneamna ealaykum biaistiqbal alkaebat 'arsalna fikum rasulana minkum yatlu ealaykum alayat almbynt lalhaqu min albatl, wayutahirakum min dns alshirk wsw' alakhlaq, wayuealimukum alkitab walsanat wahkam alshryet, wayuealimukum min 'akhbar alanbya', wqss al'umam alssabiqat ma kuntum tjhlwnh
